mapper.select: SELECT mi.company_id, mi.menu_id, mi.material_id, mi.qty, m.name AS material_name, m.unit, m.unit_price FROM menu_ingredient mi JOIN menu me ON me.company_id=mi.company_id AND me.id=mi.menu_id AND me.deleted_yn='N' JOIN material m ON m.company_id=mi.company_id AND m.id=mi.material_id WHERE mi.company_id=#{companyId} AND mi.menu_id=#{menuId} ORDER BY m.name
SELECT enabled FROM branch_menu_toggle WHERE company_id=#{companyId} AND branch_id=#{branchId} AND menu_id=#{menuId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO branch_menu_toggle (company_id, branch_id, menu_id, enabled, updated_at) VALUES (#{companyId}, #{branchId}, #{menuId}, #{enabled}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE enabled=VALUES(enabled), updated_at=NOW()
